select /* com.cj.freshway.fs.cps.common.userInfo.UserInfoFscpsMapper.selectAuthList */ a.prog_url as url, coalesce(b.search_yn, '0') as search_yn, coalesce(b.new_yn, '0') as new_yn, coalesce(b.delete_yn, '0') as delete_yn, coalesce(b.save_yn, '0') as save_yn, coalesce(b.print_yn, '0') as print_yn, coalesce(b.btn1_yn, '0') as btn1_yn, coalesce(b.btn2_yn, '0') as btn2_yn, coalesce(b.btn3_yn, '0') as btn3_yn, coalesce(b.btn4_yn, '0') as btn4_yn, coalesce(b.btn5_yn, '0') as btn5_yn, coalesce(b.btn6_yn, '0') as btn6_yn, coalesce(b.btn7_yn, '0') as btn7_yn, coalesce(b.btn8_yn, '0') as btn8_yn, coalesce(b.btn9_yn, '0') as btn9_yn, coalesce(b.btn10_yn, '0') as btn10_yn, coalesce(b.use_yn, '0') as use_yn, a.btn1_nm, a.btn2_nm, a.btn3_nm, a.btn4_nm, a.btn5_nm, a.btn6_nm, a.btn7_nm, a.btn8_nm, a.btn9_nm, a.btn10_nm
from fscps.cm_program_m a
left outer join fscps.cm_auth_program_m b on b.prog_cd = a.prog_cd and b.auth_cd in (select m.auth_cd from ( select ia.auth_cd from fscps.cm_auth_user_m ia inner join fscps.cm_authority_m ib on ia.auth_cd = ib.auth_cd where ia.user_id = #{userId} and ib.use_yn = 'Y' and ib.auth_cl = '1' union select ia.auth_cd from fscps.cm_auth_user_m ia inner join fscps.bs_user_m_if bu on ia.user_id = bu.emp_no inner join fscps.cm_authority_m ib on ia.auth_cd = ib.auth_cd where bu.user_id = #{userId} and ib.use_yn = 'Y' and ib.auth_cl = '1' ) m ) where 1=1 and a.system_cl = 'FSBO' and b.use_yn = 'Y' order by a.prog_no

SELECT /* com.cj.freshway.fs.cps.common.fscpsuserInfo.FscpsUserInfoMapper.selectUserInfo */ A.CO_ID -- 회사ID(토근세팅) , A.USER_ID AS USERID -- 사용자ID(토근세팅) , A.USER_NM AS USERNAME -- 사용자명(토근세팅) , A.EMP_NO -- 사원번호 , null AS CC_CD -- 점포ID(토근세팅) -- , (SELECT CC_NM FROM TCBCM092 Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = D.CC_CD) AS SHP_NM -- 점포명 , NULL AS ORG_ID -- 지점코드(지점ID)(토근세팅) , NULL AS ORG_ID -- 지점코드(지점ID)(토근세팅) , NULL AS DIV_ID -- 사업부코드(운영그룹ID)(토근세팅) , NULL AS SLBZ_ORG_ID -- 본부코드(FS:3000) -- , E.BRC_NM -- 지점명 -- , E.DIV_NM -- 사업부명(그룹명) -- , E.SLBZ_ORG_NM -- 본부명 -- , E.FS_US_YN FROM fscps.bs_user_m_if A LEFT OUTER JOIN fscps.bs_emp_m_if B ON A.CO_ID = B.CO_ID AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND B.INOFFICE_CL ='1' -- LEFT OUTER JOIN FRAMEONE_DEPT C ON B.CO_ID = C.CO_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD -- LEFT OUTER JOIN TCBCM084 D ON C.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND C.CC_CD = D.CC_CD -- LEFT OUTER JOIN VW_TCBCM021_01 E ON D.CO_ID = E.CO_ID AND D.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND D.DIV_ID = E.DIV_ID AND D.SLBZ_ORG_ID = E.SLBZ_ORG_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT /* com.cj.freshway.fs.cps.common.fscpsuserInfo.FscpsUserInfoMapper.selectShopAllList */ T.USER_ID , T.USER_NM as USER_NAME , T.CC_CD as SHP_ID , T.CC_NM as SHP_NM FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NM , A.EMP_NO , D.CC_CD , (SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = D.CC_CD) AS CC_NM , D.ORG_ID , D.DIV_ID , D.SLBZ_ORG_ID , E.ORG_NM , E.DIV_NM , E.SLBZ_ORG_NM , E.USE_YN FROM fscps.bs_user_m_if A LEFT OUTER JOIN fscps.bs_emp_m_if B ON A.CO_ID = B.CO_ID AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND B.INOFFICE_CL ='1' LEFT OUTER JOIN fscps.bs_dept_m_if C ON B.CO_ID = C.CO_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN fscps.bs_cc_org_m_if D ON C.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND C.CC_CD = D.CC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN fscps.bs_org_m_if E ON D.CO_ID = E.CO_ID AND D.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND D.DIV_ID = E.DIV_ID AND D.SLBZ_ORG_ID = E.SLBZ_ORG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.USER_NM ILIKE #{shpNm} || '%' AND D.CC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND ((SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = D.CC_CD) ILIKE '%' || #{shpNm} || '%' OR UPPER(D.CC_CD) = UPPER(COALESCE(#{shpNm}, '')))
UNION SELECT C.USER_ID , C.USER_NM , C.EMP_NO , D.CC_CD , (SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = A.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = A.CC_ID) AS CC_NM , E.ORG_ID , E.DIV_ID , E.SLBZ_ORG_ID , E.ORG_NM , E.DIV_NM , E.SLBZ_ORG_NM , E.USE_YN FROM fscps.bs_ex_cc_user_m_if A INNER JOIN fscps.bs_user_m_if C ON A.USR_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.CO_ID = C.CO_ID AND C.COM_CD IN ('B50', 'B52') INNER JOIN fscps.bs_cc_org_m_if D ON A.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND A.CC_ID = D.CC_CD INNER JOIN fscps.bs_org_m_if E ON D.CO_ID = E.CO_ID AND D.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_LVL_DPTH = '3' WHERE A.ATY_DIV_CD = 'S' AND C.USE_YN ='Y'
AND C.USER_NM ILIKE #{shpNm} || '%' AND D.CC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND ((SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = D.CC_CD) ILIKE '%' || #{shpNm} || '%' OR UPPER(D.CC_CD) = UPPER(COALESCE(#{shpNm}, '')))
UNION SELECT C.USER_ID , C.USER_NM , C.EMP_NO , D.CC_CD , (SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = A.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = A.CC_ID) AS CC_NM , E.ORG_ID , E.DIV_ID , E.SLBZ_ORG_ID , E.ORG_NM , E.DIV_NM , E.SLBZ_ORG_NM , E.USE_YN FROM fscps.bs_ex_cc_user_m_if A INNER JOIN fscps.bs_emp_m_if B ON A.USR_ID = B.DEPT_CD AND A.CO_ID = B.CO_ID AND B.INOFFICE_CL ='1' INNER JOIN fscps.bs_user_m_if C ON B.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO AND B.CO_ID = C.CO_ID AND C.COM_CD IN ('B50', 'B52') INNER JOIN fscps.bs_cc_org_m_if D ON A.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND A.CC_ID = D.CC_CD INNER JOIN fscps.bs_org_m_if E ON D.CO_ID = E.CO_ID AND D.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID AND E.ORG_LVL_DPTH = '3' WHERE A.ATY_DIV_CD = 'P'
AND C.USER_NM ILIKE #{shpNm} || '%' AND D.CC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND ((SELECT CC_NM FROM fscps.bs_cb_cc_m_if Z WHERE Z.CO_ID = D.CO_ID AND Z.CC_ID = D.CC_CD) ILIKE '%' || #{shpNm} || '%' OR UPPER(D.CC_CD) = UPPER(COALESCE(#{shpNm}, '')))
) T JOIN fscps.bs_shop_m_if S ON T.CC_CD = S.SHOP_ID WHERE S.SHOP_OPER_STT_CD IN ('01','02') ORDER BY T.CC_CD
